inria.net.lrmp
Class LrmpSender

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--inria.util.Entity
        |
        +--inria.net.lrmp.LrmpEntity
              |
              +--inria.net.lrmp.LrmpSender
public final class LrmpSender
extends LrmpEntity

An LRMP sender is an LRMP entity that sends data packets. It is created and managed internally by Lrmp.
